SEARCH
Package BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class BehaviorBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.BehaviorBESA
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProtocolBehavior
public class BehaviorBESA extends Object implements Runnable
This class represents a behavior of a BESA agent, to which a series of guards is associated.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

    • BehaviorBESA

      public BehaviorBESA(AgentBESA ag, String behaviorName)
      Constructs a new behavior. When creating other constructors always must be called this.

      Constructs a new behavior. When creating other constructors always must be called this.
      Parameters:

    • BehaviorBESA

      public BehaviorBESA(AgentBESA ag, boolean periodic, long milliseconds, int type)
      Constructs a new behavior.
      Parameters:
      ag - Agent to whom belongs the behavior.
      periodic - Value that it indicates if the behavior is periodic or no.
      milliseconds - Value in milliseconds that it indicates or the time out or the periodicity.
      type - Periodic or with time out

    • sendEvent

      public final void sendEvent(EventBESA ev)
      Adds a event to the queue and notify the receptor to wake up. It doesn't have to be called by the user.
      Parameters:
      ev - Event to send.

    • getThread

      public Thread getThread()
      Returns the behavior associated thread.

    • setThread

      public void setThread(Thread thread)
      Establishes the thread associated to the behavior.
      Parameters:
      thread - Thread to associate.

    • registerGuard

      protected void registerGuard(String evType)
      Registers a guard in the behavior. It doesn't have to be called by the user.
      Parameters:
      evType - A String that represents the event type.
